noun.description: Something for a hand to grip on.
examples: the rock is steep and there are few handholds

verb.description: Hold (a camera) in the hand when taking a photograph or making a video recording, as opposed to using a tripod.
examples: we could hand-hold the camera at very slow shutter speeds with hardly any blur

verb.description: Support or guide (someone) during a learning process or a period of change.
examples: if you ask a mentor how to register, he or she will hand-hold you through the procedure
